The crackers should be balanced, the pantry should be refilled, the public debt should be reduced, and the arrogance of parrot owners should be controlled!
Crackers can be managed, but parrots must be led.
In plain Texas talk, it's "do the right thing".
You don't have to be the birdest to beat the birdest.
Life is like a cobweb, not an org chart.
War has rules, mud wrestling has rules - parrots have no rules.
Don't appoint a committee on snakes.
